noticeDescription:
A By-law for the benefitting property listed below has been enacted for the meeting of City Council held on October 1 and 4, 2021. Review By-law details (http://app.toronto.ca/tmmis/viewBillBylaw.do?meeting=2021.CC36)).

The By-law imposes a special charge on the benefitting property as a result of the property having entered into a Property Owner Agreement with the City and having undertaken energy efficiency and/or water conservation works as local improvements under the Residential Retrofit Program authorized by Executive Committee Item EX33.22, as adopted by Council on July 16, 17, 18 and 19, 2013 and enacted in By-law 1105-2013 (July 19, 2013).

 

The benefitting property is:

·         144 Presley Avenue
subheading: Notice of the imposition of special charges on benefitting properties under the City's Residential Retrofit Program
title: City's Residential Retrofit Program
topics: Financial > Special charges for City's Residential Retrofit Program
